metaDescription: Discover COSTABELLA RESIDENCES F3 in Sierra Cortina, Finestrat. Luxury 3-5 bed villas from €503,000. Delivered July 2026. SONERA HOMES quality development.

content.heroIntro: Welcome to COSTABELLA RESIDENCES F3, an exclusive villa development by SONERA HOMES in the prestigious Sierra Cortina area of Finestrat, Alicante. This premium project offers 3 carefully designed villas combining contemporary architecture with practical Mediterranean living, featuring 3-5 bedrooms with built sizes ranging from 212 to 295 square meters. Priced from €503,000, these properties represent exceptional value on the Costa Blanca, positioned 40% below comparable Spanish island markets. With delivery scheduled for July 1st, 2026, COSTABELLA RESIDENCES F3 is perfectly timed for buyers seeking modern, move-in-ready homes in one of Spain's most sought-after locations. SONERA HOMES brings decades of development expertise to this carefully planned community, ensuring quality construction and thoughtful design throughout every residence. Located just 20 minutes from pristine Blue Flag beaches and surrounded by championship golf courses, Sierra Cortina offers the perfect blend of relaxation, recreation, and investment potential. The established international community speaks English, creating a welcoming environment for overseas buyers seeking both a vacation retreat and a solid property investment.

locationSection.intro: Sierra Cortina, nestled in the heart of Finestrat, represents one of Costa Blanca's most desirable residential destinations. This elevated location provides stunning Mediterranean views while maintaining easy access to modern amenities, international schools, and healthcare facilities. The area has evolved into a thriving international community where English is widely spoken, making it ideal for expat buyers. Finestrat itself sits between the vibrant coastal towns of Benidorm and Altea, offering the perfect balance between lively entertainment options and peaceful suburban living. The region's investment fundamentals are strong, with property values increasing 8% year-on-year, driven by strong rental demand (€800 per week) and limited quality supply. Sierra Cortina's elevated position provides natural ventilation and panoramic views while remaining close to all essential services including regional hospitals, international schools, and comprehensive shopping facilities.
